channel.title: Pages on Great Expectations & Greater Moments
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Great Expectations & Greater Moments

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi there! My name is Sean and you've stumbled across my blog. I'll be mostly posting about my side projects and things that I have learnt or find to be interesting. I don't presume to be an expert on anything, but what I do know is that I have a deep love for the fields of Statistics and Data Science. Consequently, I would like to excite people about the potential of these fields to help solve some of society's toughest problems.
